PageWidgetPortable.Title: Pedidos Empenho
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>CT_PEDIDOSEMPENHOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>0</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> A.ACOESPROJETOS = @CAMPO(ACOESPROJETOS) AND A.VERSAO IN (SELECT X.HANDLE FROM CT_VERSOESORCAMENTOS X WHERE X.HANDLE = @CAMPO(VERSAO))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/orcamento/empenhos/PedidosEmpenhos/Form.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Empenhos
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>CT_EMPENHOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>0</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> A.ACOESPROJETOS = @CAMPO(ACOESPROJETOS) AND A.VERSAO IN (SELECT X.HANDLE FROM CT_VERSOESORCAMENTOS X WHERE X.HANDLE = @CAMPO(VERSAO))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/orcamento/empenhoscadastro.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Liquidação Req. Fiscal
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>FN_DOCUMENTOS_EM_OP_ACOESPROJETOS.CUSTOM.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>0</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>@DATAPARTE(ANO,A.DATAENTRADA) = @DATAPARTE(ANO,@CAMPO(ANO)) AND A.HANDLE IN ( SELECT L.DOCUMENTO FROM FN_LANCAMENTOS L LEFT JOIN FN_LANCAMENTOCC LCC ON LCC.LANCAMENTO = L.HANDLE WHERE A.ABRANGENCIA = 'R' AND (L.ACOESPROJETOS = @CAMPO(ACOESPROJETOS) OR LCC.ACOESPROJETOS = @CAMPO(ACOESPROJETOS) ) )</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/e/materiais/recebimentos/RecebimentoFiscal/RecebimentoFiscalForm.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Liquidação CPA
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>FN_DOCUMENTOS.CONSULTADOCUMENTOS.CUSTOM.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>0</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>@DATAPARTE(ANO,A.DATAENTRADA) = @DATAPARTE(ANO,@CAMPO(ANO)) AND A.HANDLE IN ( SELECT L.DOCUMENTO FROM FN_LANCAMENTOS L LEFT JOIN FN_LANCAMENTOCC LCC ON LCC.LANCAMENTO = L.HANDLE WHERE A.ABRANGENCIA = 'N' AND (L.ACOESPROJETOS = @CAMPO(ACOESPROJETOS) OR LCC.ACOESPROJETOS = @CAMPO(ACOESPROJETOS) ) )</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/e/financeiro/zoomdedocumentos/Form.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Pagamentos
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>FN_PARCELAS.ZOOMDEDOCUMENTOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>0</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.VALORESBAIXADOS > 0 AND A.HANDLE IN ( SELECT L.PARCELA FROM FN_LANCAMENTOS L LEFT JOIN FN_LANCAMENTOCC LCC ON LCC.LANCAMENTO = L.HANDLE LEFT JOIN FN_DOCUMENTOS D ON A.DOCUMENTO = D.HANDLE WHERE @DATAPARTE(ANO,D.DATAENTRADA) = @DATAPARTE(ANO,@CAMPO(ANO)) AND D.ABRANGENCIA IN ('T','N') AND ( D.STATUS = 2 OR ( D.STATUS = 1 AND D.ENTRADASAIDA NOT IN ('I','O')) ) AND ( L.ACOESPROJETOS = @CAMPO(ACOESPROJETOS) OR LCC.ACOESPROJETOS = @CAMPO(ACOESPROJETOS) ) )</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/e/financeiro/zoomdeparcelas/Form.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
